Producer: Robert Yocum, Sasha Yelaun, B.I. Rosen, Johnny Remo
Production Co: Scarlett Pictures, Tip-Top Productions, Skipstone Pictures, Snakebyte Productions and Entertainment Group, Umbrelic Entertainment, Burning Sky Films, Lucky 13 Productions, Red Coral Productions
Synopsis: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura (Christina Ricci) and her seven-year-old son Cody when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life in an idyllic and remote lakeside farmhouse. Still traumatized, their physical and mental well-being are pushed to the limit as their fragile existence is threatened.
Title: Monstrous
